name: Save Prisoner Ryan
description:
Oh no!,

It’s the execution day of your buddy prisoner Ryan! Thankfully the prison cannot carry out the sentence until the UberMeat delivery is completed and Ryan has had his last meal. You will have to delay the inevitable for Ryan.

Use your keyboard’s “W”,”A”,”S”,”D” or arrow keys to move around and crash into the UberMeat delivery cars.

Roaming the map you will find usefull items to damage others and repair your own car.

Select the item to use with the 1,2,3 keys and use with spacebar! Unleash mayhem on the road….

FOR RYAN!!!!
